attributes.title: Horrifying✨✨✨
attributes.review: Ugh as soon i as i clicked the app it made me feel extremely nauseous i felt as if i was gonna pass out. This app is destined to keep people. It almost killed me✨✨✨. I wish i could give it 0 stars🤢🤢🤢🤢. But i couldn’t have expected any better from for a orange peel of a president😕. BERNIE 2020✨✨✨🥾

attributes.title: He ghosted me😫
attributes.review: I can’t believe you Donald. We were so good together. I miss your sweet texts and laughing about your horrible farts.  Now all you send me are confirmation codes. You ruined my life Donald j Trump, and I am here to say that our relationship is over. Also, I know you are having an affair with Pence.

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and it kept crashing. i just wanted to see what our orange of a president had to offer but CLEARLY he has nothing. also my son jimmy has chicken pox and he cannot stand to  look at this horrible app. cheers to all and have a happy new year!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: Honestly just wanted to see what Trump had to offer on this app. Let me TELL YOU it just littered my phone with constant notifications even after deleting the app. I don’t suggest getting this app to anyone IT WAS THE ABSOLUTE WORST CHOICE. Our “so-called” president cant even release a reliable app. So disappointed.

attributes.title: this app... no❤️🧚🏽‍♂️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in hopes of getting a decent human being in office, but when i tell you i got THE OPPOSITE, I MEAN THAT. this app has made me want to rip my hair out and is probably the most racist out there. i would suggest that we as Americans do everything in our power to DELETE IT

attributes.title: Spam
attributes.review: It was so many adds it is super unclear and it was this weird orange guy as the face of the campaign and it’s unhelpful it just a really bad app and it takes forever to open and download and it’s just really slow and the security is horrible I do not recommend

attributes.title: Scam! PLEASE DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: After downloading the app my email was hacked and some of my other platforms. It gives you loads of ads and i believe that one of those ads led to my email and credit card info being stolen. Very disappointed in the trump administration for this

attributes.title: a HUGE disappointment
attributes.review: When I got this app, I was so excited to support our lord and savior donald. But then when I downloaded it and opened it - it called me a terrorist just because I’m Pakistani-American. I don’t know how Mr. Donald could support something so mean :(. This hurt my feelings I cried for thirty nine days and two hours.

attributes.title: Very bad app
attributes.review: This app was very hard to navigate and it was overall not a pleasant experience. I am struggling to find the meaning of this app. It seems completely useless. All that is on the app can be replaced by just signing up for the text messages. Terrible app.

So, I was just having a good time on the Trump app and out of no where I started feeling a bit, ya’ know...✨ o r a n g e✨
Out of no where the app starts harassing me with the bad vibes and I just had to delete the app, because I can’t be on a app that makes me feel racist or whatever 😤💅
Don’t download it, save Tiktok 👁👄👁
